ModMetaData.name: It's all greek to me
ModMetaData.author: Timuttie, YAYO, Telardo
ModMetaData.description: This mod is simple but offers a completely different gameplay. Choose 'lost technology' in the scenario All research starts locked. Every research requires a techprint. All techprints are scattered on the world map. You should have killed the enemies and took it out. You must travel the world and acquire technology to escape.
